effect.frightsdelight.chills.description: You feel a spectral presence nearby, you may feel a chill if they pass through you.
effect.frightsdelight.fortified_mind.des: Provides immunity to Hysteria and Chills effects.
effect.frightsdelight.infected.descripti: Similar to Hunger effect, but worse.
effect.frightsdelight.slimed.description: Reduces movement speed and makes steps slimy.
effect.frightsdelight.undead_hunger.desc: Provides immunity to food Poison and Infected.
